isis.stitle: Procedural Guideline - TRANSMISSION (AIR RIDE DAY CAB, CAT. ENGINE), REMOVE/RE-INSTALL

wtsproc.wtsdescrip: TRANSMISSION (AIR RIDE DAY CAB, CAT. ENGINE), REMOVE/RE-INSTALL
wtsproc.config: Air ride cab/dual vertical exhaust/air ride assembly includes: upper and lower mounting brackets, air bags, shock absorbers, leveling valve and air line.

step1.para: Chock wheels. Open hood.
Raise vehicle, support axle with stands.
Open air tank drain valves, drain air pressure, and close valves.
Using small bottle jack at rear frame rail of cab, support cab with jack.
Disconnect air supply line from leveling valve. Disconnect air line from valve to air bags, allow air to escape from air bags, and connect air line back to valve.
From inside of the cab, disconnect both safety belts from center trim panel at rear of cab.
Remove screws retaining center trim panel. Remove bottom screws retaining trim to rear glass window. Remove center trim panel.
Pull back bottom trim in center of cab for access to bolts retaining upper mounting bracket of air ride assembly. Remove both bolts.
Remove frame cat walk.
Remove front drive shaft.
Remove bolts retaining lower mounting bracket of air ride assembly to crossmember.
Raise cab using bottle jack to gain clearance to remove air ride assembly. Remove air ride assembly.

note.para: Be sure hood is open to prevent damage.

step1.para: Support cab with wood on one side of frame rail and jack on other frame rail.
Disconnect air lines necessary to remove air tanks. Remove air tanks with frames.
Disconnect air lines and wiring from air dryer. Remove air dryer.
Remove wiring/hose harness from crossmember located behind transmission.
Remove bolts retaining crossmember to side gussets located behind transmission. Remove crossmember from right side frame rail first.

note.para: It may be necessary to use a hydraulic device to slightly spread frame rails for clearance to remove crossmember. Do not remove gussets.

step1.para: Grind 1/8 inch off each end of crossmember to ease installation of crossmember.
Remove flex tube at both muffler inlet exhaust pipes. (y-pipe).
Remove exhaust clamps retaining y-pipe (rear of cab area).
Disconnect flex tube at exhaust pipe (turbo outlet pipe).
Remove y-pipe from vehicle.

note.para: To remove y-pipe it may be necessary to remove jack. (Cab must be supported with wood block on other side.) Position y-pipe rearward of previous jack position. Support cab with jack. Remove wood block supporting cab. Remove y-pipe. Support cab with wood block and jack.

step1.para: Working from rear of transmission, disconnect all air lines necessary to remove transmission, include slave valve.
Disconnect all electrical necessary to remove transmission.
Remove shift tower and lay off to the side.
Disconnect clutch linkage from clutch arm.
Remove clutch inspection cover.
Drain transmission fluid.
Disconnect transmission cooler lines from transmission. Cap ends.
Remove transmission temperature sensor from transmission. Temporarily install pipe plug in sensor port.
Remove all bolts except 2 retaining transmission to engine.
Install and secure transmission jack to transmission.
Remove remaining 2 bolts retaining transmission. Remove transmission.
Install transmission to engine. Install all bolts retaining transmission to engine, include fuel hose/line support bracket.
Remove transmission jack.
Remove pipe plug and install transmission temperature sensor.
Connect transmission cooler lines.
Fill transmission.
Install clutch inspection cover.
Install shift tower.
Connect clutch linkage to clutch arm.

note.para: Adjust clutch after air ride assembly is installed and cab is at proper height.

step1.para: Connect all electrical to transmission.
Connect all air lines to transmission.
Install crossmember. Torque bolts/nuts to spec.
Install wiring/hose harness to crossmember.
Install exhaust y-pipe and all flex tubes. Install exhaust clamps retaining y-pipe.
Position air ride assembly in place.
From inside cab, install bolts retaining upper mounting bracket of air ride assembly.
Install center trim panel, include screws retaining trim for rear glass window.
Connect both safety belts to rear of cab.
Install bolts retaining lower mounting bracket of air ride assembly to crossmember.
Connect air supply line to air ride leveling valve.
Remove bottle jack/wood.
Install drive shaft. Torque bolts to spec.
Install air dryer. Connect air lines and wiring to air dryer.
Install air tank assembly. Connect air lines to air tanks.
Install frame cat walk.
Build air pressure and check for leaks.
Lower vehicle.
Remove wheel chocks.
